text: Referential integrity constraints: ® Itis based on a foreign key concept. Example: 1 Jannat 101 2 Faisu 102 3 Muskan 103 Table 1.5 Referencing Relation 101 Acting 102 Singing Table 1.6 Referenced Relation Now, various operations can be performed on referencing and referenced relations. The three basic operations are: ® Insertion * Deletion * Updation
